lines.text: How about the <c=#0000FF>Stop Wizard?</c>
...What about 'im?
What if he shot the gun?
Yeah? You got some way of provin' that?
Um...
Well, there's two people dead from gunshots, and one who isn't, right?
So, they were shot by the one guy who isn't dead from a gunshot.
That kinda logic might work, but...
We know there was <c=#FF00FF>only one gunshot.</c>
Unless he got 'em both in one shot, then lined up the corpses without gettin' blood everywhere, that ain't happenin'.
...Maybe that's why he set the fire! To hide the traces of blood from dragging the bodies!
And then he sealed himself in concrete?
...Sure!
I'm- I'm afraid that's not-
Er, never mind. No, that... that theory can work.
...You were gonna object.
No I wasn't.
...'cause of the ballistics. Right.
A pistol bullet like that isn't gonna have the power to go through two bodies.
That's- you- I suppose that's...
Well, fine. Sure. Yes, that's true.
And you were gonna just let us make that mistake, yeah?
...Certainly not. I'm- I'm sure I'd have realized, and said so.
B-because, because I didn't think of that.
Dr. Opal Whydah, truth-telling champion!
Shut the- shut your mouth.
